## Inspiration
- Data Journalism
- Human concept of story
  - Events/Characters/Theme or Message
  - variable scope
  - stories are composable
  - helps us to make sense of the world

## Design
- ISBN / ISSN
  - identification of series by opaque id
- Task scope
- Local first
- Integrity
